unit_path.description: [unit]Any units with this path will use the appropriate mesh name

bug_screen_material.description: [material]The material that gets set if this is a bug faction

bot_screen_material.description: [material]The material that gets set if this is a bot faction

illuminate_screen_material.description: [material]The material that gets set if this is a illuminate faction

superearth_screen_material.description: [material]The material that gets set if this is a super earth faction

slot_name.description: [string]The slot that gets the appropriate faction material
